description:
Hayata is a second-year male student of Kagamidai Academy and Shingo`s good friend. He is Kagamidai Academy`s student council president. He also transferred to Yuihime Girls` Academy to participate in 2-T. He acts as the vice-president at Yuihime Girls` Academy`s student council. He has a fiancee.
Source: Wiki
name: Mukunashi Hayata
